resources.string: Help Karl to find the\nCheese Piece!

• Players are presented with a grid-based game board containing different types of pieces, including blocks and a cheese piece.\n\n • Players have to move the cheese piece to a given green box. To do that, players have to move other blocks to make space.
• Players can’t move a block above other block. They have to make space for a move.\n\n • And there is a timer. If a player moves the cheese piece into the green box,
1. Under 30 seconds – Player will get 3 stars and 300 points\n 2. Under 60 seconds – Player will get 2 stars and 200 points\n 3. Else – Player will get only 1 star and 100 points
